name: Circles Memory Game
description:
Circles is a wonderful new memory game for iPhone, iPod touch, iPad, and iPad mini.

"Simple but effective"
– Pocket Gamer

"This is great"
– Dalrymple, The Loop

"Circles is a fantastic little game"
– iMore

“Circles looks beyond great”
–Beautiful Pixels

PLAY AGAINST FRIENDS WITH GAME CENTER

Challenge friends, play with weapons, earn coins, and more! Can you out-memorize your friends?

GET THE TOP SCORE

See how many taps you can remember in a row – do you have the world's best memory?

BEAT ALL 120 LEVELS

See if you can beat all 120 levels – each one harder than the last.
